# [Interview #1158: OdysseyCon 2016, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1158#11)

#### Blightsong

What is Proving Day in Vorin mythology?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Uhhhm, equivalent of Bar Mitzvah.
